summary: Fleur is the blue angel in one of Hong Kong's "flower houses" - bordellos and night clubs of the 1930's. A detached and beautiful performer, she falls in love with Twelfth Master Chan, heir... See full summary Â»
cast: Anita Mui|Leslie Cheung|Alex Man|Emily Chu|Irene Wan|Sin Hung Tam|Yue Wong|Chia-Yung Liu|Kara Wai|Yin Tse|Pa-Ching Huang|Ruby Wong|Ching Wai
title: Yim ji kau
